descriptionlist.description: FOSS TOTP 2FA app with a clean, straigforward UI.

changelog.change:
• Fixed importing images & pasting functionality on iOS 15+
• Fixed pin code being copied to the clipboard with whitespace
• The pin code can now be copied to the clipboard by tapping on the dark content area, rather than having to long press on the cell, cc ⇝ @NoWisDev
